data.scheme_name: Aerospace and Defence Policy 2016 - Purchase of land - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provide 100% reimbursement of stamp duty and registration charges paid for on purchase of land.
data.eligibility: New and existing A&D enterprises that undertakes expansion or diversification and which commences commercial production during the operative period are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The A&D enterprise would have to give a detailed project plan before allotment of land. 
  2. It will have to commence production within 5 years from the date of allotment of land in case of Mega and Large A&D enterprise, or within 3 years in case of A&D MSME, or the within the operative period of the scheme, whichever is earlier.
data.beneficiaries: New and existing A&D enterprises that undertakes expansion or diversification and which commences commercial production during the operative period are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The A&D enterprise would have to give a detailed project plan before allotment of land. 
  2. Unit will have to commence production within 5 years from the date of allotment of land in case of Mega and Large A&D enterprise, or within 3 years in case of A&D MSME, or the within the operative period of the scheme, whichever is earlier. 
  3. For leasing of government land, other terms and conditions would be determined by the competent authority on a case to case basis.
data.nodal_agency: Industries and Mines Department Government of Gujarat
data.context: The Government aims to make Gujarat a leading hub for aerospace and defense manufacturing, fostering talent, innovation, and investment in research and development to support the sector.
data.objective: The objectives of coming out with an incentive scheme for A&D sector are to: Attract 10 %by value of orders of the defence sector in India over the next 10 years. Attract five mega A&D enterprises to the state in the next 5 years. Develop the A&D ecosystem in the state. Develop skilled manpower and innovation in the A&D sector across the research, design, development and manufacturing value chain. Create 20,000 direct/indirect jobs in the A&D sector over the next 10 years.
data.description: Scheme provide 100% reimbursement of stamp duty and registration charges paid for on purchase of land.
data.how_to_apply:
Applicant can apply on the below mentioned portal -
https://ifp.gujarat.gov.in/IC/login.jsp
data.funding_mechanism: Fund/Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Company Incorporation Certificate, Memorandum of Article of Asso./copy of partnership deed (Firm Registration) /Agreement of LLP / Co-operative society registration.
2. Copy of applicable industrial registration certificate.
(EM-I / EM-II Registration or Udyog Aadhaar Registration / IEM / LOI / LOP Registration)
3.Copy of the land purchase deed.
4.Registration Index.
5.Copy of N.A. Permission/ 63 AA Permissionof land for Industrial use
6.Copy of rent deed or rent receipts / GIDC Allotment Letter ( If applicable ).
7.Detailed Project Report.
8.Loan sanction letter from Financial Institution.
9.Copy of CTE from GPCB (if applicable).
10.Affidavit in prescribed format for local employment, Govt. dues / outstanding, court case against Govt.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Industries Commissionerate,Block 1, 2nd Floor,Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11,Gandhinagar-382011, Gujarat.
E-Mail ID : icifc@gujarat.gov.in
Phone No : 079-232-40889
data.beneficiary: Specified Manufacturing Industries - All Entities - Gujarat - All MSMEs and Non - MSMEs
